title: Amend a Loss Claim Type Request
description: Amend a Loss Claim Type Request

typeOfClaim.description:
The type of claim to be applied.

Permitted values for "self-employment": 

    carry-forward 

    carry-sideways

Permitted values for "uk-property-non-fhl" and "foreign-property": 

    carry-sideways

    carry-sideways-fhl

    carry-forward-to-carry-sideways
